meaningMnemonic: Both a <radical>leader</radical> and a <radical>king</radical> have a <kanji>duty</kanji> to protect their people. A good leader always protects his followers, and a good king always protects his subjects. This is their duty.
readingMnemonic: You’re the village <reading>nin</reading>compoop (にん), but the king and the leader still have a <kanji>duty</kanji> to protect you. Even a nincompoop is important to the kings and leaders of the world.
